scripts.purge: purgecss -css assets/css/*.css --output _site --content _site/**.html --safelist fa-tags fa-folder-open fa-x-twitter fa-facebook fa-linkedin fa-bluesky
scripts.purge-ci: purgecss --css assets/css/*.css --content _site/**.html --output _site/assets/css --safelist fa-tags fa-folder-open fa-x-twitter fa-facebook fa-linkedin fa-bluesky
